While I found these classes fascinating and rewarding, transitioning into abstract thinking was quite a challenge. Many of peers around me also dealt with similar struggles as we worked through difficult proofs. So as a hands-on visual learner, I was inspired to create educational visualization apps to help me and my peers grasp these abstract mathematical concepts better. During the summer of 2020, my former math professor Paul Bamberg helped mentor me in creating these visualization apps in RShiny.
